text:
Hot Beverages

Masala Chai
$3.99
Spiced Indian tea blend with aromatic flavors, perfect for chai (tea) enthusiasts.
Bun Specials
Dabeli (Oil/Butter)
$5.49
Spicy potato filling in a bun, garnished with tamarind chutney, pomegranate, sev, and peanuts. Choice of oil or butter.

Masala Bun Burger
$6.49
Spiced patty served between buns, typically includes a blend of Indian spices and sauces for a unique taste.

Cheese Masala Bun Burger
$7.49
A bun filled with a spicy mixture of cheese, onions, tomatoes, and aromatic Indian spices, creating a unique twist on the traditional burger.

Bun Samosa
$5.99
Crispy fried samosa filled with spiced potatoes and peas, sandwiched in a bun with tangy chutneys.

DC Special Jumbo Burger
$8.99
Jumbo-sized burger with a blend of paneer, aloo tiki, topped with cheese, fresh vegetables, and authentic Indian chutneys, served in a bun.
Extra Cheese
$0.99
Add extra cheese to your bun special for a richer, creamier experience.

Vada Pav (Oil)- 2 PCS
$8.99
Deep-fried spiced potato fritter sandwiched in a soft bun, typically complemented with tangy tamarind and spicy garlic chutneys.
Sandwich
Masala Toast Sandwich
$7.49
Toasted bread filled with a spicy mixture of mashed potatoes and peas, complemented by aromatic Indian spices and green chutney.
Cheese Masala Toast Sandwich
$7.49
Toasted sandwich filled with a spicy blend of mashed potatoes, peas, aromatic Indian spices, and melted cheese.
Veg Cheese Sandwich
$7.99
Layered with homemade green chutney, slices of tomato, cucumber, boiled potato, and capsicum, sprinkled with ground spices, and topped with cheese.
Veg Grill Cheese Sandwich
$7.99
Grilled bread layered with cheese, typically includes tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, green bell peppers, and a spread of green chutney.
Grilled Paneer Sandwich
$8.49
Grilled sandwich filled with marinated paneer, onions, capsicum, and a blend of Indian spices, complemented by a spread of green chutney.
Schezwan Cheese Sandwich
$8.99
Spicy schezwan sauce and melted cheese between slices of bread, typically accompanied by onions and bell peppers.
DC Special Club Sandwich
$9.99
Triple-layered sandwich with a special blend of vegetables, chutneys, and spices, typically includes cheese and is grilled to bring out the flavors.
Milkshake
Vanilla Milkshake
$4.79
Creamy Vanilla Shake, Blended to Perfection with Rich Ice Cream
Strawberry Milkshake
$5.49
Creamy Strawberry Milkshake- the perfect fruity indulgence
Strawberry Banana Milkshake
$5.99
A blend of ripe strawberries, creamy bananas, milk, and ice cream, creating a smooth and fruity beverage.
Chocolate Milkshake
$5.99
Decadent chocolate shake blended to perfection, a delightful treat for chocolate lovers and beyond.
Oreo Milkshake
$5.99
An indulgent milkshake blended with the classic flavors of Oreo cookies.
Lassi
Plain Lassi
$4.99
Traditional, smooth yogurt drink- perfectly tart and refreshing.
Mango Lassi
$5.99
Traditional Indian drink with mango and yogurt.
Rose Lassi
$5.99
Refreshing rose flavored yogurt smoothie.
Chat Specials
Pani Puri (Cold)
$4.99
Hollow, crispy puris filled with a spicy and tangy mixture, typically includes tamarind chutney, potato mash, and onion, served with flavored water.
Sev Puri
$6.99
Flat crispy puris topped with potatoes, onions, tamarind and green chutneys, and garnished with sev (crunchy gram flour noodles).
Bhel Puri
$7.49
Savory Indian street snack bursting with flavorful ingredients like puffed rice, tangy chutneys, and mixed vegetables.

Basket Chat
$7.99
Basket chat is a delightful assembly of crispy fried baskets filled with a mix of spiced chickpeas, potatoes, onions, and chutneys, typically garnished with fresh herbs
name: Desi Chatko
